title: India's top two EV makers step up efforts to plug charging infrastructure gaps
description: Tata Passenger Electric Mobility and JSW-MG Motor India partnered with Tata Power Renewable Energy and launched initiatives to solve EV charging issues. TPEM will offer a combination of EVs and solar rooftop systems, while MG's E-Hub will simplify access to charging stations. These efforts aim to ease EV adoption and reduce costs for EV owners.
